notes: Currently, I am working for a company while learning more about Frontend and UI/UX Design
If I have free time, I will develop a manga reading app
At the beginning of 2025, I will join military service, so I will limit long-term activities and see you again in 2028 ^_^

timelines.title: Started College Journey at CTIM
timelines.subtitle: Higher Education
timelines.description: Embarked on an exciting academic journey at CTIM College, pursuing a dual degree in Information Technology and Graphic Design, laying the foundation for a versatile career in tech and creative fields

timelines.title: 2D Designer Fresher Position
timelines.subtitle: Career Start
timelines.description: Began professional career as a 2D Designer, working on various creative projects and developing practical skills in digital design while building a strong portfolio of work

timelines.title: FE & Mobile Developer at CRM Company
timelines.subtitle: Career Growth
timelines.description: Transitioned into a challenging role combining Frontend and Mobile development skills, working on innovative CRM solutions and gaining valuable experience in modern development technologies

timelines.title: Graduated with Dual Degree
timelines.subtitle: Academic Achievement
timelines.description: Successfully completed dual bachelor's degree in Information Technology and Graphic Design, demonstrating expertise in both technical and creative domains, ready for new challenges in the tech industry
